message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm aiming to sell it for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand your enthusiasm for the product, but I believe I can only afford to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider lowering the price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is my starting price.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. Can we meet somewhere in between, perhaps at $14,000?
Hi Bob, you seem very interested in this product, and I want to see us make a deal.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $14,500?
Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I am willing to go up to $14,000 for this product. Could we aim for a price closer to $13,750?
